main event: A civilian reported seeing one small round object in the sky in Gardena, California on 16 June 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a dime at arm's length., The sighting lasted for nine minutes., The object moved in a straight line during the observation., The flight could not be identified by interceptor fighter aircraft., It was speculated that the object may have been a balloon from weather units in the area.
witness description: civilians Mr. and Mrs. from Southwest Upton Place Gardena
